Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2014 07:08PM 3littlebirds wrote: I am 3 weeks out from BMX. I had SNB, but I don't have any incisions under my arms. My incision goes around the underside of my nipple and about 2 inches out towards my underarm, so they did the SNB from my mx incision. However, was very sore and still swollen under my arms. My PS ok'd only spray deodorant 1 week after surgery. When I saw her on Tuesday, she told me I could shave very carefully while looking in the mirror to make sure I wasn't cutting anything that was numb.
